title: Sub Prime Lender Seeks Partner
content:
SOURCE Newstart Canada

TORONTO 

"We are excited to find the right partner to help us grow Newstart Canada. Unbankable Canadians from coast-to-coast deserve the chance to borrow at affordable rates," said Dave Baker 

Newstart is Canada's 

Since 2007, Newstart has provided over 3800 microloans with an average loan amount of $5500 

Newstart Canada differentiates itself by being a certified B-Corporation; a status which confirms both their social and environmental mandate. Although the FINTECH/Marketplace Lending industry has recently exploded, this independent lending company continues to serve and help a demographic that is currently unwanted by the upcoming industry players.

The 8 year track record has supported investor returns of 8 to 12%, while balancing a bad debt rate of 15%. With this is mind, Newstart is now ready to scale operations across Canada 

Additionally, Newstart has built a very impressive customer care software system. Online web applications are processed, approved and documented via a seamless and fully automated process. Although customer care is handled by real live qualified customer care coaches, all administrative functions are highly streamlined through a centralized in-house server. This is coupled with a state of the art voice over IP phone system and call recording for quality assurance.

Newstart continues to maintain an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau.
